title: The Role of government
creator_credit: BBC-TV, Open University and David Jackson
brief_description: Legislation is one of the ways by which tight control is kept on environmental matters relating to public health. Looks at the way such legislation arises, how it is drafted within a Government department and the political constraints on its implementation.
